message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product. I think it's really valuable, but I'm open to offers. How about $130 to start?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can't go above $100. Looking forward to your response.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm confident this product is worth more. How about we meet in the middle at $115?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. Considering the product's value, I'm willing to offer $110. Let me know if this works for you.
